refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Input works exactly the same way as load, except it does NOT store the data unless the INTO clause or the AFL store operator is present. The instance_id argument allows you to select which SciDB instance you want to input into. To see a list of SciDB instances running on your system, type scidb.py status hostname at the Unix command-line.
